value.title: Nvidia’s new AI upscaling tech makes low-res videos look sharper in Chrome, Edge
value.excerpt: Nvidia's latest GPU driver introduces its new AI-based upscaling technique for making lower-resolution videos streamed offline look better on a high-resolution display. Now available via the GeForce driver 531.

value.title: AI-generated audio of Joe Biden and Donald Trump trashtalking while gaming is taking over TikTok
value.excerpt: Profanity-filled AI deepfakes of Biden and Trump chatting while gaming are very funny. But how voice AI will be used in 2024 is a more open question.

value.title: Venture Investor B Capital Raises First Healthcare Fund
value.excerpt: The firm has raised about $250 million for the healthcare-only vehicle and plans to devote about $250 million more to medical investments through a diversified growth fund.

value.title: YouTube’s new head talks 2023 priorities, including AI, podcasting, Shorts and more

value.title: OpenAI debuts Whisper API for speech-to-text transcription and translation
value.excerpt: OpenAI is rolling out the Whisper API, a hosted version of the open source speech-to-text model that the company released in late 2022.

value.title: How generative AI could lower healthcare costs and speed up drug development
value.excerpt: In the future, specifying a drug target may be like sitting down to ChatGPT. After a few clicks, you'll have your novel therapeutic.

value.title: ‘AI Is The New Electricity’: Bank Of America Picks 20 Stocks To Cash In On ChatGPT Hype
